mapper.insert: insert into favorite_blog_group(user_id, cover, name, open, description) values (#{userId}, #{groupParam.cover}, #{groupParam.name}, #{groupParam.open}, #{groupParam.description})
insert into favorite_blog_group (user_id, name, open, default_group) values (#{userId}, #{defaultName}, true, true)
mapper.select: select fbg.id, fbg.user_id, fbg.cover, fbg.name, fbg.open, fbg.description, fbg.created_time, count(fb.id) blogCount from favorite_blog_group fbg left join favorite_blog fb on fbg.id = fb.group_id where user_id = 19 group by fbg.id
select * from favorite_blog_group where user_id = #{userId} and default_group = true
